mapper.select: SELECT r.id as recipe_id, r.name as recipe_name, ri.measurement_amount as measurement_amount, mt.name as mt_name, mt.abbreviation, i.name as i_name, r_in.instruction_number as instruction_number, instr.text as in_text FROM recipe r LEFT OUTER JOIN recipe_ingredient ri on ri.recipe_id = r.id LEFT OUTER JOIN measurement_type mt on mt.id = ri.measurement_type_id LEFT OUTER JOIN ingredient i on i.id = ri.ingredient_id LEFT OUTER JOIN recipe_instruction r_in on r_in.recipe_id = r.id LEFT OUTER JOIN instruction instr on instr.id = r_in.instruction_id WHERE r.id = #{id}
